attributes.action: Death Penalty For Crimes Including Children e.g Murder, Abuse etc.
attributes.additional_details: All crimes towards children such as Murder, Sexual Assault and Serious Neglect. we forget these people will go inside for as little as 6months to 1 year and we pay to feed cloth and give them somewhere to sleep then they are released and look for there next victim it sickens me.  I would like to add that I would also like to see higher sentences for neglect and mistreating of children. Baby P's mother, her partner and his brother should all be put to death.
